channel.description: Previous Versions of this page: Milestone 8 Requirements Milestone 8 Requirements (Spring 2022)

item.title: Milestone 8 Requirements
item.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. General requirements: You will need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions You will need to comment your code using XML comments You will need to update your UML to reflect your current code

item.title: Milestone 8 Requirements (Spring 2022)
item.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. For this milestone you are going to be adding the functionality for taking payments from customers to your PointOfSale project. This will involve working with a compiled code library which you cannot see the code for!
